text: :This article is about the dish; the computer game can be seen at Cube 2: Sauerbraten Sauerbraten is a meat dish eaten mainly in Germany, but also neighbouring countries. The name comes form sauer (sour) and braten (roast). It refers to the way the dish is prepared: the meat is left in a kind of sour sauce (based on vinegar) to marinate Image:Sauerbraten- mariniert.jpg|Marinating Image:Sauerbraten-gebraten.jpg|Ready to serve Category:German food Category:Meat dishes
title: Sauerbraten
